meanings.definition: Things that are not necessary or essential.
meanings.sent1: She packed only the inessentials for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The inessentials cluttered up the room.
meanings.sent3: The inessentials in her bag made it too heavy to carry.
meanings.sent4: His life felt burdened by the weight of inessentials.
meanings.sent5: The inessentials seemed to weigh her down more than the essentials.

meanings.definition: The state of being unimportant or unnecessary.
meanings.sent1: He realized the inessentials of the situation after reflecting on it.
meanings.sent2: The meeting focused on cutting out the inessentials to save time.
meanings.sent3: The inessentials of the argument made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind cleared when she let go of the inessentials.
meanings.sent5: The inessentials faded away as she focused on what truly mattered.
